a.dialog: What purpose does fixing these small number of files do for you?
I'm actually encrypting more files than you're fixing right now.
There is genuinely no point to this.

b.dialog: There's gotta be something philosophical about this.
He cheated death twice by being ever so clever.
His punishment was rolling a rock up a hill just for it to roll down the hill for eternity.
A fruitless endeavor. Just like this!
